original_text: Jesus knew what they were thinking and asked, “Why are you thinking these things in your hearts?
korean_text: 예수께서 그 생각을 아시고 대답하여 이르시되 너희 마음에 무슨 생각을 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus knew what they were thinking
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 무엇을 생각하고 있는지 알았다

sentences.original_text: Why are you thinking these things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 왜 이런 것들을 생각하고 있느냐
